vehicles

Class Helicopter

  • java.lang.Object
    • vehicles.Vehicle
      • vehicles.Helicopter

  • public class Helicopter
extends Vehicle
    This class is the base for a Helicopter object, which is a type of Vehicle.
    Version:
    Oct 26, 2025
    Author:
    Nick Stoyanov

      Constructor for a Helicopter object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Helicopter

        public Helicopter(double speed,
                  double maxCapableSpeed,
                  int acceleration,
                  int weight,
                  int liftPower,
                  int rotorEfficiency,
                  int altitude,
                  int racePositionPercentage)
        Constructor for a Helicopter object.
        Parameters:
        speed - Current speed of the helicopter
        maxCapableSpeed - maximum capable speed of the helicopter
        acceleration - acceleration of the helicopter
        weight - weight of the helicopter
        liftPower - lift power of the helicopter
        rotorEfficiency - rotor efficiency of the helicopter
        altitude - altitude of the helicopter
        racePositionPercentage - percentage of race completed

      • Helicopter

        public Helicopter()
        No argument constructor

    • Method Detail

      • getLiftPower

        public int getLiftPower()
        Accessor method to access the lift power of the helicopter.
        Returns:
        helicopter lift power

      • getRotorEfficiency

        public int getRotorEfficiency()
        Accessor method to access the rotor efficiency of the helicopter.
        Returns:
        helicopter rotor efficiency

      • getAltitude

        public int getAltitude()
        Accessor method to get the altitude of the helicopter.
        Returns:
        helicopter altitude

      • setLiftPower

        public void setLiftPower(int newLiftPower)
        Mutator method to set the lift power of the helicopter. To ensure it's reasonable, it only accepts values between 100 to 800.
        Parameters:
        newLiftPower - new lift power to be set

      • setRotorEfficiency

        public void setRotorEfficiency(int newRotorEfficiency)
        Mutator method to set the rotor efficiency of the helicopter. To ensure it's reasonable, it only accepts values between 1 to 10.
        Parameters:
        newRotorEfficiency - new rotor efficiency to be set

      • setAltitude

        public void setAltitude(int newAltitude)
        Mutator method to set the altitude of the helicopter. To ensure it's reasonable, it only accepts values between 0 to 3000.
        Parameters:
        newAltitude - new altitude to be set

      • calcSpeed

        public double calcSpeed(double speed,
                        int weight,
                        int acceleration)
        Method to calculate a hypothetical speed of a helicopter while still considering the weight of itself. This method considers other helicopter specific factors such as a vehicles lift power, and the rotor efficiency.
        Specified by:
        calcSpeed in class Vehicle
        Parameters:
        speed - Vehicle Speed
        weight - Vehicle Weight
        acceleration - Vehicle Acceleration
        Returns:
        accurate speed of helicopter

      • canClearMountain

        public boolean canClearMountain(int mountainHeight)
        This method is ment to see if the helicopter can successfully cross on top of a mountain without hitting it.
        Parameters:
        mountainHeight - height of the mountain to cross
        Returns:
        true if helicopter can clear the mountain, false otherwise

      • tailwindBuff

        public void tailwindBuff()
        Method for providing a general tailwind buff to the helicopter, increasing its rotor efficiency by a random amount between 1 and 3. This buff will not allow the rotor efficiency to exceed 10.

      • weatherDebuff

        public void weatherDebuff()
        The weather debuff method simulates the effect of bad weather conditions on the helicopter's rotor efficiency. It reduces the rotor efficiency by a random amount between 1 and whatever the original rotor efficiency was, ensuring that the rotor efficiency does not fall below 1.
        Specified by:
        weatherDebuff in class Vehicle

      • changeAltitude

        public void changeAltitude(int altitudeChange)
        Method to reduce or increase the altitude of the helicopter by a specified amount. This is primarly used for simulating climbing or descending.
        Parameters:
        altitudeChange - amount to change the altitude by (can be negative)
